metadata.label: Physical description
metadata.value: A machine readable hierarchical Digital Cultural Heritage Catalogue compatible with IIIF 2.0 Presentation API.

metadata.label: Notes
metadata.value:
IIIFDexir is a large-scale, nested IIIF Collection ecosystem built on the International Image Interoperability Framework (IIIF) Presentation API. It features a root collection with deeply hierarchical sub-collections, integrating IIIF resources (Manifests and Collections) from approximately 62 international GLAM institutions.
Key technical aspects:

metadata.label: Structure
metadata.value: Tree-like nesting of Collections and Manifests in JSON-LD format, enabling recursive browsing in compliant viewers.

metadata.label: Semantic Enrichment
metadata.value: Augmented with custom RDF ontology (Turtle format) defining classes (e.g., ResourceCollection, DigitalResource, Creator) and properties (e.g., hasCreator, hasTGNPlace), aligned with standards like Schema.org, Wikidata, AAT, and TGN.

metadata.label: Interoperability
metadata.value: Supports seeAlso for external data sources; designed for knowledge graph extraction, SPARQL queries, and automated processing

metadata.label: Focus
metadata.value: Thematic aggregation of Persian/Iranian cultural materials, including "Departed Collections" that logically reunify physically dispersed assets.

metadata.label: Queryable
metadata.value: The data is fully RDF compliant, enabling advanced queries using SPARQL across collections based on semantic annotations.

metadata.label: Data Visualization
metadata.value: The observation of the whole collection structure and relationships is facilitated through any graph visualization can understand RDF.

metadata.label: Source
metadata.value: Hosted at https://github.com/MehranDHN/IIIFCollection (root collection typically at paths like IIIFCollection/IIIF2Collection.json).
